trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform"></xref> objects.

Except as noted, members of this class behave exactly as described by the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>, and <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> documentation.

**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection> class provides several special features: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection> objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.

For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
XAML Implicit Collection Usage
XAML Values
*oneOrMoreGeneralTransformObjectElements*
One or more <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform> objects, declared using object element syntax.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref> class.
Initial object in the new collection class.
collection is `null`.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref> class with the specified capacity, or the number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform"></xref> objects the collection is initially capable of storing.
The number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform"></xref> objects that the collection is initially capable of storing.
Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform"></xref> object to the end of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref>.

Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to add a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform"></xref> to add to the end of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref>.
value is `null`.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref> is read-only.
\- or -
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref> has a fixed size.
Removes all <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform"></xref> objects from the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref>.
This method does not change the capacity of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref> is read-only.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true.`
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true`.
Indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref> contains the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref>.
**true** if the collection contains value; otherwise **false**.
Copies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform"></xref> objects in the collection into an array of GeneralTransforms, starting at the specified index position.
The destination array.
The zero-based index position where copying begins.
array is `null`.
index is less than zero.
array is multidimensional.
-or-
The number of items in the source is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination array.
Gets the number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref>.
The number of items in the collection.
Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.
An enumerator that can iterate the collection.
Searches for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform"></xref> object within a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref>.
The object to locate.
The zero-based index position of value, if found; otherwise -1;
Inserts a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform"></xref> object into the specified index position within the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref>.

Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Insert%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to insert a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.
The zero-based index position to insert the object.
The object to insert.
value is `null`.
index is not a valid index in the .
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref> is read-only.
\- or -
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref> has a fixed size.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform"></xref> object at the specified index position.

Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Item%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to insert a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.
The zero-based index position of the object to get or set.
The object at the index position.
value is `null`.
index is not a valid index in the .
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref> is read-only.
\- or -
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref> has a fixed size.
Deletes a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref>.
The object to remove.
**true** if value was successfully deleted; otherwise **false**.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref> is read-only.
\- or -
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref> has a fixed size.
Deletes a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref>.
The zero-based index position to remove the object.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1.IsReadOnly"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection> instance is cast an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> interface.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref> is read-only; otherwise, `false`.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1.GetEnumerator"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> interface.

For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

A zero-based <xref href="System.Array"></xref> that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref>.
The first position in the specified <xref href="System.Array"></xref> to receive the copied contents.

This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

`true` if access to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, `false`.

It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref>.

This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.Add(System.Object)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

The position into which the new element was inserted.
